page.title: 13BISHOPS CASTLE SHOW
page.content:
It is held in midsummer on one of the fields by the Bishops Castle to Lydbury North road.The show has classes for sheep, cattle and horses. There are many side shows,stalls and competitions,including one for the best cake.
They have working hunter ponies and show ponies.They have prize money of about Â£7 for show ponies and Â£5 for working hunter ponies.
Sometimes they have shire horse's ploughing with old ploughs.They have a puppet show. There is often a running race. Lots of people come. They have terrier racing and sheep shearing.
It is run by the Young Farmers Club.
